sentences.english: The spring water is of dark green, deep and running all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 泉水碧綠凝重，深不見底，終年湧流不息。

sentences.english: He gazes directly into the camera, his expression a mixture of elegiac sadness and deep empathy.
sentences.chinese: 他直視鏡頭，表情既憂鬱又凝重。

sentences.english: The committee walked out, grim -faced and shocked.
sentences.chinese: 全體委員走了出去，臉色凝重，大爲震驚。

sentences.english: Of dignified showily bring a person spatiotemporal stagger with romantic vogue bewildered be puzzled.

sentences.english: It appears dignified yet bears a tune of romance, reflecting the nation's thoughts and emotions.
sentences.chinese: 它凝重而浪漫，體現着一個民族的思想與情懷。

sentences.english: The mood at the top is understandably solemn.

sentences.english: Ancient Proses on Stones with Qiu Jin dignified style.

sentences.english: The influence of Buddhism on China's aesthetics is wide, deep and far-reaching.

sentences.english: This smell, Wei Gong holding the glass hand feel shocked, complexion is dignified.

sentences.english: Premier Wen Jiabao went to the hardest hit northern Sichuan Province, in the boat with solemn expression_rs.

sentences.english: Then, one afternoon, Al came home with a girm look on his face.

sentences.english: Baoding entire ancient dignified, magnify very ambitious.

sentences.english: The beauty of ware and glaze is revealed from its deep and imposing characteristics.

sentences.english: Partly true to its name, Decaffeinated Espresso Roasted is not caffeine-free but contains little caffeine content.

sentences.english: The following two sections will analyze the "thoughtfulness" in the novel contents.
sentences.chinese: 接下來兩章主要分析畢飛宇小說內容上的“凝重感”。
